play/error/noChannel: ❌ **|** You're not on a voice channel or you're not on the same channel as me
play/error/noArgs: ❌ **|** You need to put a song or url for me to play!
play/error/invalidLink: ❌ **|** Sorry but the link/name you entered is not valid.
